title: 1.29 The United Kingdom of Saul, David, and Solomon
itunes:title: The United Kingdom of Saul, David, and Solomon
description: I set the stage upon which the Hebrew united kingdom of Saul, David, and Solomon was created. I explain the geopolitical situation, and the Biblical sources we have: the books of Samuel, Kings, and Chronicles.
content:encoded: I set the stage upon which the Hebrew united kingdom of Saul, David, and Solomon was created. I explain the geopolitical situation, and the Biblical sources we have: the books of Samuel, Kings, and Chronicles.
itunes:subtitle: Keynote ep: The drama of the united kingdom
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
